location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Handwritten list by Lewis Pelly of letters sent by steamer

mods.abstract: List of all the letters sent by steamer on 5 January 1868 giving the name and address of each recipient and a brief summary of the content.Recipients included Miss Anna Eudocia Pelly, Messrs Remington & Co, Narayn Wassadeojoee, William Lockyer Merewether and Sir Bartle Frere.The list includes an indepth summary of the letter to Sir Bartle Frere in which Pelly discusses the need for a new residency steamer, the difficulties with the persian authorities and his desire to discuss central Russian affairs with Lord Stanley.
